DOC.brief_summary: During last years topical steroid creams have been suggested to be effective treatment for non-retractable foreskin instead of circumcision. Aim of this study is to investigate the efficacy, safety and persistence of treatment results of a medium potent steroid cream in a double-blind, randomized, placebo-controlled study.
DOC.brief_title: Treatment of Phimosis With Topical Steroid Cream -Double-blind, Randomized, Placebo-controlled Study
DOC.criteria: nonretractable foreskin requiring treatment age under six years old, previous operation or steroid treatment for phimosis
